member.name: T:TCPServerDll.TCPServer
member.summary: Create and running a TCP Server

member.name: M:TCPServerDll.TCPServer.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a TCP Server than listens to the specific port.
member.param: The port number that server wants to listen it

member.name: M:TCPServerDll.TCPServer.SendData(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Send text data as tcp packet via TCP server.

member.name: M:TCPServerDll.TCPServer.SendData(System.String,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send byte[] data as tcp packet via TCP server.

member.name: M:TCPServerDll.TCPServer.StopServer
member.summary: Stop server and dispose all of accepted sockets.

member.name: M:TCPServerDll.TCPServer.GetAcceptedSocketsEndPoint
member.summary: Return IpEndPoints of accepted sockets by server.
member.returns: List of IpEndPoints of accepted sockets
